title: Evenepoel, Vingegaard, Roglič All Abandon in High-Speed Spill at Itzulia Basque Country
content:
Several riders were injured and transported to local hospitals by ambulance. Officials neutralized the times but allowed a breakaway to contest for the victory.

Read the full article at Evenepoel, Vingegaard, Roglič All Abandon in High-Speed Spill at Itzulia Basque Country on Velo.
author: ahood
